FILE: cm740800v11.0.txt
DYAD: JAPAN - THAILAND
RIVALRY: RIV1333
DISPUTE(S): MID1687 MID1785 

PSNOTES: Siam was allied with Japan during World War II, following numerous pre-war diplomatic exchanges and the beginning of a Japanese invasion of Thailand. Japan occupied Thailand during WWII and consistent with other occupation cases, this is coded as .5

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190317
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190317

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

WWII MIDs: MID1687 MID1785
